channel.title: HELP NEEDED - How can my friends join my server?
channel.description:
[b]I DONT KNOW WHERE THIS TOPIC MUST BEEN POST, SO MODS MOVE THIS![/b]
Oke guys, my question is:
[b][u]How can my friends join my server on silabsoft server?[/u][/b] ----------------------------------------------------------
When they enter my IP Adres. It says: Error conecting to server. So, how can they join my server?
[b]I HOPE U GUYS HELP ME! [/b]

item.title: HELP NEEDED - How can my friends join my server?
item.dc:creator: @drachtpkz123 drachtpkz123
item.description:
@drachtpkz123 wrote:

[how to portforwars via your router]

open run in start bar
typ in cmd
in cmd file type in ipconfig
open internet explorer put in adress bar 192.168.1.1
type you router name and password
then click on forward or virtual servers
add a server on port 43594
and in the cmd file you typed ipconfig you see standartgateway that code you need to copy and paste in the ip adress by forwarding or virstual server and then just click on ok or save.
Done.
XD

[how to make a no-ip account]
go to www.no-ip.com
register there and login and then go to add server or add host and then make a host
then go to your server files and run it just simple click on initaze, run ,runserver, copy of runserver
Done with all stuff to run a server
only thing you need is internet and a router

Read full topic
